animeTitle: The System Forces Me To Play The Villain
otherNames: The System Forces Me to Be the Playboy, Hệ Thống Ép Ta Làm Nhân Vật Phản Diện, The System Forces Me to Be the Villain, Xitong Bi Wo Zuo Fanpai, Xìtǒng Bī Wǒ Zuò Fǎnpài, 系统逼我做反派, The System Forces Me To Play The Villain, The System Forces Me To Be A Playbo
synopsis: Wu Jing, who loves to play games and hates old-fashioned plots, traveled through the game and happened to meet that the cultivation forces in the entire Qianzhou territory were arresting the flower picker “Qianli Fengliu”. But the “Super Villain System” was accidentally activated, and Wu Jing, who wanted to capture the flower picker who made great achievements, never expected that when he went back to the room to check the original character’s belongings, he found Mixiang and night clothes that represented the identity of the flower picker. Could it be that I am a flower picker—a thousand miles of romance??what??
